content.description:
To make it easier for users and contributors to see precisely what notable changes have been made on TravelgateX.

All notable changes on TravelgateX platform will be documented in this page.

2019-08-08

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-08-08)

2019-08-05

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-08-05)

2019-07-31

- [New TravelgateX Slack Bot](https://github.com/travelgateX/slack-botx)
- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-07-31)

2019-07-15

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-07-15)

2019-07-04

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-07-04)

2019-06-25

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-06-25)

2019-06-13

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-06-13)

2019-06-03

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-06-03)
- stats gateway

2019-05-30

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-05-30)

2019-05-23

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-05-23) - Accesses, Clients and Suppliers querys chagend to the new entitiesx client
- flow cascade permissions - code field from accessData to match with query response
- CatalogAdviseMessage to extern schema

2019-05-16

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-05-16)

2019-05-06

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-05-06)

2019-05-02

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-05-02)

2019-04-30

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-04-30)

2019-04-24

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-04-24)

2019-04-08

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-04-08)

2019-02-28

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-02-28)

2019-02-14

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-02-14)

2019-03-07

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-03-07)

2019-02-20

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-02-20)
- owner of default client - api-key permissions on hotlst
- image GCR - CreateOrgTemplate - Default client on addClient function
- Old org code format

2019-02-11

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-02-11)
- Audit deprecated `loadFile` query
- SelectChildren function changed - Added org code

2019-02-07

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-02-07)
- Response header. Content-type

2019-01-30

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2019-01-30)
- Entities resolvers

2019-01-11

- The DEFAULT_TEMPLATE option has been modified.The permissions given to the owner were : **iam:all:viewer** Now: **all:all:1a** `This is for future updates. Ignore it for the time being.` The owner of the organization now has an admin permission all across the apis: **org:api:rsc:crud1xaf.** - Intern members (@xmltravelgate.com, @travelgatex.com) only can be added to TEAM type groups. - Operations now does not check permissions. All operations listed.
- deleteApi function implemented. - Api-key can be added to more than one product on the same folder. - Group query can now be filtered by parent.
- Error when adding apis to TEAM type groups. - When creating new member used to always return "Auth0 connection error" - Some errors description have been improved.

2019-01-09

- Endpoint error messages
- Launch patch with new patch file - New patch fixing write headers
- Headers patch

2018-12-19

- New implement of cache - Use gzip to unzip response instead of delegate to request module
- Two caches, one for apikeys and another one to redirect endpoint - Implement case not zipped - Implement cache to rewrite endpoint
- Timming

2018-12-17

- Worker

2018-12-14

- Use worker and main thread to stats depends search, and calculate - Send stringify of body_worker - Protect Buffer
- ElapsedTime when error, and fix jsonstringify - Timming
- Tracing from worker (detail) - Tracing from utils2 (detail)

2018-12-13

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2018-12-13)
- Timming and use workers for stats. - Status code when endpoint fails - Worker

2018-12-11

- Handler for updating api-keys to different groups
- Error description to not found members - deleteApi functionality - Parent filter to groups - Filters to external schema
- isAdmin from productData

2018-12-04

- All check for GetSons - Description to more than one member in a api-key error
- Descendents query, only returns valid groups - all permissions, now returns only orgs and validGroups
- Debug prints

2018-11-29

- Upgrade libraries
- Autogencode. Deleted commit

2018-11-27

- 'all' requestors now able to update accesses non of their ownage
- Shared automatic update in UpdateAccess

2018-11-26

- impersonatedJwt to member resolver
- all permissions for productData->apis resolver - all' user case in resource data resolver for role connection - get organizations function for normal permission table

2018-11-22

- Max length for org code raised to 8
- UpdateOrganizationDomain mutation to intern schema - Error on alpha-numeric characters for organization code - UpdateOrganizationDomain delete function - Domain filter to organizations function resolver - Autogenerated code for new orgs with no code - Domain filter to organizations function in external schema
- all:api:all use case

2018-11-21

- RefreshToken now returns a list of apikeys with the result - Intern schema modified adding domain scalar and domains in organization - Organization data resolver has been modified to add domain resolvers
- Token-gen for updateGroupAdmin

2018-11-20

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2018-11-20)
- Refresh token funcition. - Create Organization. - Errors description. - Update group
- Entities call when move folder and change members refresh token position.
- Useless folders from create folder template

2018-11-07

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2018-11-07)
- Force group names to lowcase only in TEAM/ORG cases
- Useless folders
- Update organizations.

2018-10-28

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2018-10-28)
- New field **Geoname** in Hotels query, which provides hotel's geographical information

2018-10-18

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2018-10-18)
- Profile type
- `Supplier`, `Client` and `Access` entities resources content.

2018-09-26

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2018-09-26)

2018-09-20

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2018-09-20)
- Product name `FlightsX`.

2018-09-10

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2018-09-10)

2018-08-29

- Added pagination to partners list

2018-08-27

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2018-08-27)

2018-08-22

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2018-08-22)
- Entity's Owner and its related Filters, queries and mutations. - `parents` and `descendents` queries for `Group` and `Organization`. - Old connect form migrated to TravelgateX - Clients and suppliers CRUD
- Corrected change of Payment's structure - Basic Audit by request using header `TGX-Audit: 1` See more: [TGX Headers page](/travelgatex/concepts/request-headers)

2018-08-14

- New section for entities in IAM - Accesses CRUD
- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2018-08-14)

2018-08-13

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2018-08-13)

2018-08-08

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2018-08-08)
- [TGX Headers page](/travelgatex/concepts/request-headers) - Support basic Tracing by request using header `TGX-Tracing: 1` - Return groups codes on entities queries (`accessData`,`suppierData`,`clientData`,`profileData`). - Access name filter - New default group when user account is deleted. - Audit members has been added in createMember and deleteMember
- Response of Access and Supplier query when no accesses on the request - Entity propagation - Permission check - Update member auditions and refactor that funcionality - URL resolver - API/resource resolvers - Roles function with new admin permissions

2018-07-31

- Improvements in the organization selector and modal. - [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#2018-07-31)
- IAM mutations - All groups in resources and apis resolvers
- Delete member mutation (Delete Apikeys or uninvite user emails) - Public deleteGroup function and made it public

2018-07-27

- Organizations queries resolvers

2018-07-26

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#20180726)
- Groups resolvers

2018-07-25

- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#20180725) - Admin permissions management for groups.
- Old support Apikey
- Team's permission management for groups.
- Flow (Cascade) permissions. - Inprove time response of groups resolvers.

2018-07-16

- [GraphQL Schema breaking changes](/travelgatex/release-notes/breaking-changes/). Substitutes and fixes to Deprecated and Deleted Notes pages.
- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#20180716) - Changelog based on [keep a changelog](https://keepachangelog.com)
- Deprecated schema notes pages. - Deleted schema notes pages.
- Documentation pages' styles

2018-07-10

- [Deleted schema notes](/travelgatex/release-notes/deprecated_notes/) - Documentation pages' index
- [GraphQL Schema updated.](/travelgatex/release-notes/graphql-schema-changes/#20180710) - New version of [Deprecated schema notes](/travelgatex/release-notes/deprecated_notes/)

2018-07-09

- Previously deprecated queries. [See more](/travelgatex/release-notes/breaking-changes/#2018-07-09)
